options.text: "Permission to speak, sir?" asks Private Third Class @@RANDOM_NAME@@, saluting you. "Many of us are tired of looking the same, and would like the freedom to express ourselves through our appearance, sir. I mean, sir, it doesn't hurt to let us dye our hair once in a while, does it?"
options.result: soldiers with colourful mohawks make themselves perfect targets for snipers

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: restrictive gun laws
policiesAndNotabilities.name: restrictive gun laws

options.text: "This is ridiculous!" roars @@RANDOM_NAME@@, shaking his fist at you. "If I tell a soldier to put on pantaloons and a tunic, there's a good reason for it - and I expect to be obeyed without question. And who are these soldiers demanding change anyways? I'd like to see them court-martialed!"
options.result: the nation's soldiers are considered the best-dressed in @@REGION@@

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: absence of drug laws
policiesAndNotabilities.name: absence of drug laws

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: restrictive gun laws
policiesAndNotabilities.name: restrictive gun laws

options.text: "You know," murmurs romantic novelist @@RANDOM_NAME@@, dreamily staring out the window. "A change of uniform might not be too bad. What if we made all our soldiers wear medieval suits of armour? It would sure highlight the chivalry and honour of @@NAME@@'s armed forces."
options.result: troops clank into battle wearing antique suits of armour

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: museums and concert halls
policiesAndNotabilities.name: museums and concert halls

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: suspicion of poets
policiesAndNotabilities.name: suspicion of poets

options.text: "Actually, battle armour is a great idea!" exclaims @@RANDOM_NAME@@, representative from Better Future Inc, dumping a bundle of papers on your desk. "Here's our blueprints for the latest battlesuits that we've come up with. Sure it will be costly, but it will make our soldiers invincible!"
options.result: soldiers are equipped with multi-million @@CURRENCY@@ battlesuits

policiesAndNotabilities.full: may add or remove notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates

options.text: "The solution is not through technology, but through religion," declares zealot @@RANDOM_NAME@@ as she waves a censer under your nose. "Why not make all soldiers fight in the name of @@FAITH@@, and give them priestly robes while they're at it?" [[color=purple]Low Religiousness[/color]]
options.result: soldiers go to war dressed in cassocks and robes

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: irreverence towards religion
policiesAndNotabilities.name: irreverence towards religion

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates

options.text: "Why make them wear anything?" asks nudist @@RANDOM_NAME@@, standing to attention in your office. "Without clothes to impede them, your soldiers can move faster in battle - and we don't have to waste any more money on uniforms. Besides, all you need is a gun to kill someone, right?"
options.result: shock troops shock enemy forces with their nudity
